sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Clapperboard, Code, Film, User, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Download, Globe } from 'lucide-react'; const App = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('compositing'); const NavItem = ({ id, icon: Icon, label }) => ( ); const ProjectCard = ({ title, description, duration }) => (

{title}

{duration &&

{duration}

}

{description}

); const sections = [ { id: 'compositing', icon: Clapperboard, label: 'Compositing' }, { id: 'technical', icon: Code, label: 'Technical' }, { id: 'motion', icon: Film, label: 'Motion' }, { id: 'personal', icon: User, label: 'Personal' } ]; const ContactInfo = ({ icon: Icon, text, href }) => ( {text} ); const renderContent = () => { switch (activeSection) { case 'compositing': return (

VFX & Compositing

Experienced Nuke Compositor with 3 years of expertise in creating seamless visual effects. Currently working at Incognito studio s.r.o. on feature films and commercial projects.

); case 'technical': return (

Technical Skills

Proficient in industry-standard software and pipeline tools with extensive experience in both 2D and 3D workflows.

); case 'motion': return (

Motion Design

8 years of experience in motion graphics and animation, creating dynamic visual content for various clients and projects.

); case 'personal': return (

Personal Projects

Passionate about experimental animation and the fusion of analog and digital media.

); default: return null; } }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Logo */}

Martin Tomek

Motion Designer & VFX Artist

{/* Contact Info */}
{/* Navigation */}
{sections.map((section) => ( ))}
{/* Footer */}

Available for new opportunities

Willing to relocate to Canary Islands

{/* Main Content */}
{renderContent()}
); }; export default App;
